comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "He is of the Peigan Nation", according to the NYT article above. Piegan being a part of the Blackfoot or Blackfeet Nation in Montana. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piegan_Blackfeet

comment.author: 75836277@N03
comment._content: He was a native american of the Flathead Nation of Montana also known as Nick Lassa here is his wiki pagehttp://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nick_Lassa

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: I see from en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nick_Lassa that lassa was born in 1895, making him no older than 18 by the time this photo was taken. He doesn't seem that young to me. Could there have been 2 Long Time Sleeps?

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: This photo is reproduced in The Breckenridge news., May 14, 1913, Image 7, with the same text as in the NYT article (plus additional paragraph). Nick Lassa was obviously another person.
